translation.name: Biblica® Baịbụlụ Nsọ nʼIgbo Ndị Ugbu a nke dịrị onye ọbụla ịgụ

content: Abụ ekele

content.text: Keleenụ Onyenwe anyị, nʼihi na ọ dị mma.

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Keleenụ Chineke kachasị chi niile elu.

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Keleenụ Onyenwenụ kachasị ndị nwenụ niile.

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Keleenụ onye ahụ naanị ya na-arụ ọrụ ebube dị iche iche,

content: ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Keleenụ onye ahụ ji nghọta ya kee mbara eluigwe niile,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Keleenụ onye wuru ụwa nʼelu ogbu mmiri,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Keleenụ onye ahụ kere anyanwụ na ọnwa,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Onye mere anyanwụ ka ọ na-acha nʼehihie,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Onye mere ka ọnwa na kpakpando na-achị nʼabalị,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Onye ahụ tigburu ụmụ niile e buru ụzọ mụọ nʼIjipt,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: O duuru ndị Izrel site nʼIjipt pụta,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: O ji aka ya dị ike nke o setịpụrụ esetipụ dupụta ha;

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Onye ahụ kewara Osimiri Uhie abụọ,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Onye duuru ndị Izrel gafee nʼetiti ya,

content: nʼihi na ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Ma Osimiri Uhie riri Fero na ndị agha ya niile;

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Keleenụ onye duuru ndị ya gafee ọzara,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Onye ahụ tigburu ndị eze dị ukwuu,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: O gbukwara ndị eze dị ike nke ukwuu,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: O gburu Saịhọn eze ndị Amọrait,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Na Ọg eze Bashan,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Were ala ha nye dịka ihe nketa,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: O nyere ohu ya Izrel ala ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nketa ha,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Onye chetara anyị mgbe anyị na-adịghị ike,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Mee ka anyị nwere onwe anyị site nʼaka ndị iro anyị,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Ọ na-enye ihe niile dị ndụ nri,

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.

content.text: Keleenụ Chineke nke eluigwe ekele.

content: Ịhụnanya ya na-adịgide ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.
